question: I have diabetes type-2I have been prescribed actos,Glucophage,Diovan,zetia,and simvastatin.I experience Erectile dysfunction as I am 66 years old.I have asked for a prescription for ED,and was prescribed Viagra.As Viagra reduces your blood pressure,and Diovan is used for blood pressure reduction,is there any possibility thatI could go into a very low blood pressure status that could be dangerous?Thank you
title: Any danger in using Diovan with Viagra?
